channel.title: CVE Feed for Octolize -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Octolize -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-32828|2024-04-26T11:03:19.456Z -- Octolize -- Flexible Shipping
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Octolize Flexible Shipping.This issue affects Flexible Shipping: from n/a through 4.24.15.

item.title: CVE-2024-31943|2024-04-10T17:41:07.108Z -- Octolize -- USPS Shipping for WooCommerce – Live Rates
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Octolize USPS Shipping for WooCommerce – Live Rates.This issue affects USPS Shipping for WooCommerce – Live Rates: from n/a through 1.9.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-31944|2024-04-10T17:39:55.378Z -- Octolize -- WooCommerce UPS Shipping – Live Rates and Access Points
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Octolize WooCommerce UPS Shipping – Live Rates and Access Points.This issue affects WooCommerce UPS Shipping – Live Rates and Access Points: from n/a through 2.2.4.
